mapper.select: SELECT toat_id ,toat_name, toat_url , toat_duration, toat_format, toat_remark,isenable FROM tvso_advertisement WHERE 1=1 AND toat_name LIKE CONCAT(TRIM(#{toatName}),'%') ORDER BY toat_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tvso_advertisement (toat_name, toat_url , toat_duration, toat_format, toat_remark,isenable) VALUES (#{toatName},#{toatUrl},#{toatDuration},#{toatFormat},#{toatRemark},#{isenable})
mapper.update: UPDATE tvso_advertisement SET toat_name = #{toatName}, toat_url = #{toatUrl}, toat_duration = #{toatDuration}, toat_format = #{toatFormat}, toat_remark = #{toatRemark}, isenable = #{isenable} WHERE toat_id = #{toatId}
